english_example_sentence: If the child were to touch the hot stove, his hand would burn.
russian_example_sentence: Если ребенок прикоснется к горячей плите, его рука обожжется.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer çocuk sıcak sobaya dokunsa, eli yanar.
